item.title: Email to Steve Easterbrook and the Board of Directors of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2019-05-31_phone_call_about_McDonalds_Monopoly_frauds_Redacted.pdf From : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) (info@europe-v-mcdonalds.org) Subject : Phone call about McDonald’s Monopoly frauds Date sent : May 31, 2019 at 23:36（Beijing time） To : Steve Easterbrook, Board of the Directors of McDonald’s Corporation <bod@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL IS ALSO ADDRESSED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION. I AM FORMALLY ASKING THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MCDONALD’S CORPORATION TO IMMEDIATELY START AN OFFICIAL INQUIRY INTO THE MCDONALD’S MONOPOLY FRAUDS WHICH HAVE HAPPENED ACROSS EUROPE AND ACROSS THE WORLD FOR THE LAST FEW YEARS.
